title: Bug 95992Problems resolving type name inside generic class
description: Bug 95992Problems resolving type name inside generic class
OB: ajc reports an error when compiling the following code:interface Base<T {static interface Inner {}}class Test<T extends Test.InnerTest implements Base<T {static class InnerTest implements Inner {}}$ ajc 1.5 Test.javaTest.java:14 [error] Inner cannot be resolved to a typestatic class InnerTest implements Inner {Sun's javac compiles it without any error.The error can be avoided by simply writing "Base.Inner" instead of just "Inner".Also, it compiles fine if the constraint "extends Test.InnerTest" is left away.
